Control Statement: The organization: a. Employs [Assignment: organization-defined security controls] at alternate work sites;b. Assesses as feasible, the effectiveness of security controls at alternate work sites; andc. Provides a means for employees to communicate with information security personnel in case of security incidents or problems.
